1.content: Emily wakes up one morning after a dream of someone telling her she can change the size of anything. She is skeptical and wants to try it on something/someone. What will she use her powers on?
1.title: What will she do

choices: Grow just her breasts for starters.
Change her target to the tree house.
11.content:
Emily smiles a devious smile. Why, herself, of course. Because if she can alter the size of anything she can think of, she wants to try herself first. This could be fun, so she changes into her swimsuit just in case her powers only affect clothing close to the skin of a target. But so she doesn't look like an idiot, she puts some normal clothes on over top of her swimsuit and takes her empty backpack. She heads downstairs and devours her breakfast like any 17 year old would, (i.e. like a swarm of hungry locusts) then goes out and hops on her bike after loading a few snacks into her backpack. "If I'm gonna try this out, I may as well make a day of it..." she says as she pedals away from her home.

Once she reaches her favorite location, out in the middle of a big open field with her old tree house nearby being the only man-made structure for at least a few miles or so. This is perfect should she decide to grow, as then there was little risk of harming anything important unless she gets into the multi-mile range. Of course, for something a little more subtle...she always wanted bigger breasts. B-cup was nice, but D or even G-cup sounded better. And if they prove to be too much of a hassle, she can always shrink them back down again.

Or she could shrink herself down and enjoy her snacks at a toddler size or smaller. That could be fun too. And if her powers turn out not to be real, no harm done. She could see the world from a bug's perspective - and grow herself again if things get too dicey at that size, so there's little risk involved.

Then again...her tree house now seems to be awfully small... She can test these powers on it instead of herself and make it bigger. Or small enough to hold in her hand. Or...there were always wild animals roaming around. She could grow a bunny rabbit or shrink a fox or something, provided it doesn't pose any danger to herself as she doesn't want her parents to worry. Or explain why she got bit by a giant fox. That one might be tough to explain.

Any of these options are good, she reasons, but she wants to only try one thing. And that one thing she wants to try to do is...
11.title: Herself

choices: Return to normal and go home, slowly improving herself each day.
Go home as she is and explain her new powers.
10 feet is good...but you know what they say. BIGGER is better!
111.content:
Grow her whole body. But first, Emily takes off all her clothes, except her swimsuit, and stuffs them into her backpack. Then she tries to grow. She decides on 10 feet for starters. "Alright, I want to grow myself to 10 feet tall, because clearly I can do...that?" Emily says almost laughing, that is until she notices her body slowly creeping taller and taller, already 6 feet tall and still growing. She's stunned into silence as 7 feet passes, then 8 feet. By the time her body stops growing at 10 feet tall, like she wanted, Emily has a big grin of delight on her face.

"It...it worked! Yahoo! And hey, my swimsuit grew with me! I can grow or shrink anything I want, to any size I want!" Emily cheers at her discovery. She doesn't know why she has this power, but that hardly seems to matter. No more can her siblings tease her for being shorter than they are. She can be taller than them at any time for as long as she wishes, or shrink them to be shorter than her. She could put her sister in a pickle jar if she wants...though she would only do that for a short time. As annoying as her sister gets, Emily still loves her and can't bring herself to inflict lasting harm on even her worst enemy.

Emily decides to find out what it's like to have bigger breasts, and so focuses on just her breasts to make them bigger. She cups them and feels as they fill out more and more of he swimsuit top, enjoying the sensation. Once they hit about D-cup in size, she stops and they halt their progress. She then hauls out a hand mirror from her now small backpack and makes it expand until it's big enough to be used like a full body mirror after leaning it against a tree so she can see herself in it. Emily likes what she sees. Being able to manipulate nearly any part of her body to be bigger or smaller, including her entire body, means she can score nearly any boyfriend she wants. But...her family might notice something off if she returns looking like a walking wet dream.

But why does she have to return right away? Why hide her gift? She can simply go home as is and tell her family what she can do...though her bike is really quite small now, and would need to be grown if she wants to ride it home. Or, she can grow even bigger. As long as she's careful, she can quite possibly be as big as she wants. If it also means she can survive in space, the sky is not the limit! She would like to try that out...but not now. This spot just isn't big enough for her to safely grow that huge in without endangering people's homes and lives. What to do...
111.title: Grow her entire body.

choices: Emily decides to grow now to freak Emelia out.
Emily grows herself a foot taller the next day.
Emily grows herself 10 feet tall with D-cups in the span of a week.
1111.content:
"This is so cool! But... I think I'll return to normal for now and slowly introduce a bigger, hotter, new me to the world. I'd like to mess with these powers with my family before I spill the beans." Emily says to herself, her decision made.

Emily first shrinks the hand mirror back to its original size and carefully loads it into her backpack. Then comes the painful part: relinquishing her newly attained height and bust. It's not physically painful, but she shrinks herself down very slowly with great reluctance. She likes being big and having a large rack, but she has made her decision and sticks to it.

After a few minutes pass, Emily is finally back to her original 5'5" height and B-cup breasts. She sighs and puts her actual clothes back on over her swimsuit, then puts her backpack on. However, before she leaves on her bicycle, Emily focuses on her old tree house and makes it expand until she can comfortably walk in and out of it without having to duck at her normal height. She widens the tree it's attached to for good measure so it can take the extra weight. With one last look back, she hops onto her bike and heads for home.

Once there, Emily's greeted by her 'little' sister Emelia. "Welcome back, little sis! Enjoy your bike ride?" she says, giggling at her tease about their height difference. The 14 year old is 5'8" compared to Emily's 17 years of age and 5'5" height. And Emelia sure likes to remind her of it.

"Keep teasing me, Emelia. Soon I'll be bigger than you just as I should be as the older sister..." Emily says lowly, clearly not enjoying the tease. She then says, "And yes, I had a pleasant ride. Where's everyone else?"

"Errands, work, the usual. Eric left for college again. He might be back on the weekend." Emelia replies nonchalantly. She then asks, "Wait, what do you mean you'll be bigger than me soon? You say it like you know for sure it's going to happen!"

Whoops. Emily quickly covers up her little slip up by saying as she goes inside, "Um, I don't. Duh. It's just a feeling, and a strong one at that. Don't strain your brain too hard on it. Sisters are hard to replace, you know!"

Emelia is still suspicious, but without any evidence to suggest Emily is lying to her she has no choice but to drop the subject with a hearty, "Right. Whatever..."
1111.title: Return to normal and go home, slowly improving ...

choices: Mess with Emilia (shrink or grow her)

Emily decides to go home. Testing her powers and messing around with it in general seems to be more interesting than everything else. At her size it's kinda difficult to carry all of the stuff she brought with her until she realizes she can simply shrink her stuff until it fits into her pockets.

11311.content:
After checking that nobody was home to see her changing stuff she found her big sister Tara sleeping in her bed. She must have had the same idea and just stayed home. "Emily?" she asked surprised. "Is that you?" While asking she stood up and stood right in front of Emily. Her little sister was only as tall as her hips high. To be sure she isn't hallucinating she pants her now much smaller sister, which caused her to burst out in laughter.

11311.title: Big sister is home. Mess with her

choices: Her entire family. (may or may not include herself)
12.content:
Emily gets an idea. She can try her 'new powers' on her family, and see if her dream was real. She decides whatever she's going to do, she's going to make it subtle. She doesn't want her family member(s) to freak in case this turns out to be real. And also be in danger due to becoming the size of a bug or endangering the house because they could put most of their body through it before she can change the size of it, and even then she'd have to worry about the neighbors' homes and that just gets ugly real fast.

Her first target potential is her mother. She's attractive for a mother of three, and had brown hair much like Emily did. She's always been a bit on the short side, at 5'2"... Emily figures she could grow her mother a little bit, perhaps an inch or so as a gift...provided these 'powers' work. On the other hand, since her mom is already a bit short...she probably wouldn't notice losing an inch or so, especially if Emily chose to give the inch or so back if these powers are real. Emily wouldn't mind being able to look her mom in the eye instead of looking down at her a bit, or looking down just a little more...

Second on her list of 'victims' is her father. At 5'11", he's pretty average for a man, if a little pudgy in the middle. Emily wondered if an extra inch might encourage him to finally go on that diet he kept saying he was going to go on? She worried a bit about his health, truth be told. Or perhaps she could make him a little lighter by shrinking him down just a little? Then again, she might get chewed out for it, so maybe not...

Emily remembers that her older brother was visiting today. At 6'3", he's the tallest in their family. He's nice as far as brothers are concerned and shared Emily's brown hair, though he rarely combed it. He's a target Emily wouldn't mind messing with a little less subtly. She's the middle child, it's her job to mess with her siblings a little, so she figures. Perhaps she can make him tall enough to bump his head on a doorway and then bring him back down just to mess with him? Or...she can shrink him down so she can stare him in the eye without practically having to stand on a chair. That could be fun...if these powers work, that is.

Then their was her little sister. How ironic, considering she was 14 and 5'8" - 3 years younger and inches taller than Emily. And boy did she love to tease Emily about it. She's dirty blonde, from their father's side, but sometimes it's hard to notice the difference. Emily could use her to spook the living daylights out of their brother by growing her to their brother's size...but then her sister would rub it in her face about how she was so much taller. On the flip side, Emily could get a little bit of revenge on her by making her shorter than herself so she'd stop teasing Emily about the age and height difference just because puberty seems to like her more.

Finally, Emily could broaden her focus onto her entire family. Either make them all bigger or smaller. If she wants, she could include herself. Any of these could work, that's certain, but only if her powers are real. If not, Emily fears she's going to be making a fool of herself. Ultimately, she chose to try out her 'powers' on...
12.title: Family

It seemed like no matter what Emily tried to do, she couldn't get a hold of her powers, and Emilia was destined to grow until she could.
